title: Top Places to Visit in Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh
content: Ghaziabad is a city in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. It is sometimes referred to as the "Gateway of UP" because it is close to New Delhi, on the main route into Uttar Pradesh. It is a part of the National Capital Region of Delhi. It is a large and planned industrial city, with a population o

title: Top Places to Visit in Ghazipur, Uttar Pradesh
content: Ghazipur (previously spelled Ghazeepore, Gauspur, and Ghazipour), is a city in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. Ghazipur city is the administrative headquarters of the Ghazipur district, one of the four districts that form the Varanasi division of Uttar Pradesh. The city of Ghazipur also consti

Top Places to Visit in Hamirpur, Uttar Pradesh
content:
Hamirpur is a city and a municipal board in Hamirpur district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. It is the administrative headquarters of Hamirpur district.

title: Top Places to Visit in Hapur, Uttar Pradesh
content: Hapur (known earlier as Haripur) is a city in, as well as the headquarters of, Hapur district, in western Uttar Pradesh, India. Located about 60 kilometres (37 mi) east of New Delhi, the city is part of the Delhi National Capital Region (NCR). National Highway 9 passes through the city, connectin

title: Top Places to visit in Hardoi, Uttar Pradesh
content:
Hardoi is a city and municipal board in Hardoi district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. It is the administrative headquarters of Hardoi district.
 
Demographics
As of 2011 India census, Hardoi city had a population of 1,30,429. Males constitute 52.59% of the pop

title: Top Places to visit in Hathras (Mahamaya Nagar), Uttar Pradesh
content: Hathras is an ancient city and a municipal board in Hathras district, in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. It is the headquarters of the district that was created on 3 May 1997, by incorporating parts of: Aligarh, Mathura, Agra Districts, and Khair Tehsil. It forms a part of Aligarh Division.</p
